form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition for Adjustment of Status,, I-140

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/27/2023 TO THE SECRETARY OF 11/20/79 REMARKS The petition was filed on PERSONAL INTERVIEW CONDUCTED The petition is approved for status under section: DOCUMENT CHECK ONLY SPOUSE, FIELD INVESTIGATION COMPLETED 201 (b) CHILD 203 (2) DATE US APPROVED INS OF APPROVAL PREVIOUSLY FORWARDED ACTION 29 JAN 1980 201 (b) PARENT (4) 203 (a) DISTRICT WASHINGTON, D. C. REMARKS (Continued) (PETITIONER IS NOT TO WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE) 20. Check the appropriate box below and furnish the information required for the box checked: Beneficiary will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in W.Delhi, (CITY IN FOREIGN COUNTRY) (FOREIGN is in the United States and will apply for of a lawful permanent resident in the office of the Immigration and Natua- Service at (STATE) If the application for adjustment of status is denied, the apply a abroad at the American Consulate in New Delhi (CITY IN FOREIGN COUNTRY) 21. My residence in the United States is: (C/O. if appropriate) (Apt. No.) (Number and Street) (Town or city) (State) Code) 7117 Galgate Dr. Springfield 22. My address abroad (if any) (Number and street) (Town or city) (Province) (Country) c/o Sh. N.D. SIKRI, 1093 Sector 23. Last address at which I and my spouse resided together From To (Town or city) (State or Province) (Country) (Apt. No.) (Number and (Month) (Year) (Month) (Year) 7117 Galgato Spring field, Va. 22152 24. Address in the United States where beneficiary will reside Same as above I (City) (State) 25. Address at which beneficiary is presently residing (Apt. No.) (Number and street) (Town or city) (Province or State) (ZIP Code) 1093 Sector 18C, chandigarh 18, 160018 India 26. Beneficiary's address abroad (if any) is: (Number and Street) (Town or City) (Province) (Country) Sh. 0. Sikri, SE Residences Hathnikund Barrage Circle, old canal Rest House 27. If this petition is for a child, (a). Is the child married? N/A (b). Is the child adopted child? Yamuna Nagar, Haryana India your If so, give the names, dates, and places of birth of all other children adopted by you. If none, so state. 28. this petition is for a brother or sister, are both your parents the same as the alien's parents? If not, submit a separate statement giving full details as to parentage, dates of marriage of parents, and the number of previous marriages of each parent. 29. If separate petitions are also being submitted for other relatives, names of each relationship to petitioner. Mr. Om Parkash Sikri- 30. Have you ever filed a petition for this alien before? No If so, give place and date of result. 31. If beneficiary is in the United States, give the following concerning beneficiary: (a) Last ed in U.S. (b) Last arrived as (c) Date beneficiary's stay expired or will (Mc ay) (Visitor, student, exchange alien, crewman, etc.) expire as shown on his Form I-94 or I-95 Name and address of present employer (e) Date alien began this employment
